name: Unsea 2022
description:
Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

A storm is coming! Play as a lighthouse keeper who must turn on the light to guide the ships. But the building conceals secrets, objects mysteriously disappear, and even more disturbing, the rooms change unpredictably as the weather deteriorates.

Platform: Android, IOS
Engine: Unity
Number of player: 1

Producer : Valentin DENEAU
Game Art : Jade BARBIER, Rémi BARD, Jade MAILLARD, Gaëtan PLANTEGENEST
Game Design : Quentin GAUTHIER, Vincent RIGAUD, Sonny SAUTRON
Game Design & Programming : Samuel BRANGER, Kilian NICOL
Game Programming : Théo HAGRY, Maxime PARANT
Music & Sound Design : Maxence CHIRADE
